text: Sodium iodide is a chemical compound. It is composed of sodium and iodide ions. The chemical formula is NaI. It is a white crystalline solid. It is a weak reducing agent. When it is exposed to oxygen in the air, it turns yellow- brown. It does this because some of the iodide was oxidized to iodine. It is used to supply iodine to the human body. ==Related pages== *Sodium fluoride *Sodium bromide *Sodium chloride Category:Sodium compounds Category:Iodine compounds
title: Sodium iodide
